name: Abeego Variety Beeswax Food Wrap
description: Carry your lunch or store your veggies in a plastic-free wraps. These self-adhesive and reusable wraps are great for covering your leftovers, and they're breathable so they keep your food fresher for longer (when compared to plastic wrap). Plus, they're biodegradable and compostable, so they create no waste at the end of their life.Made of hemp and organically grown cotton fabric infused with beeswax, tree resin and jojoba oil.Includes 1 small wrap (18 x 18cm), 1 medium wrap (25 x 25cm) and 1 large wrap (33 x 33cm).Wash with cold water and a light dishsoap.Keep away from warm water and heat sources.
